alert.note: Alert for Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 9:46PM EST until further notice by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. .No additional rainfall is expected over the next 48 hours, and snow melt where it still remains will be gradual enough to not cause additional rises on rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, The north end of Lakeview Drive is covered by water. Several houses have water to their foundations on Steinberger Lake Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Sunday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM EST Sunday was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue falling through minor flood stage and reach 6.o feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
